SELECT t1.id, t1.module, t1.content, t1.request_uri, t1.ip, t1.province || ' ' || t1.city AS region, t1.execution_time, t1.browser || ' ' || t1.browser_version AS browser, t1.os, t1.create_time, t2.nickname AS operator FROM sys_log t1 LEFT JOIN sys_user t2 ON t1.create_by = t2.id
t1.is_deleted = 0
AND ( t1.content LIKE '%' || #{queryParams.keywords} || '%' OR t1.ip LIKE '%' || #{queryParams.keywords} || '%' OR t2.nickname LIKE '%' || #{queryParams.keywords} || '%' )
AND TRUNC(t1.create_time) >= TO_DATE(SUBSTR(#{queryParams.createTime[0]}, 1, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND TRUNC(t1.create_time) <= TO_DATE(SUBSTR(#{queryParams.createTime[1]}, 1, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY t1.create_time DESC

SELECT COUNT(1) AS count, TO_CHAR(create_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS createDate FROM sys_log WHERE TRUNC(create_time) BETWEEN TO_DATE(SUBSTR(#{startDate}, 1, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(SUBSTR(#{endDate}, 1, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY TO_CHAR(create_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY createDate ASC

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ip) AS count, TO_CHAR(create_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS createDate FROM sys_log WHERE TRUNC(create_time) BETWEEN TO_DATE(SUBSTR(#{startDate}, 1, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(SUBSTR(#{endDate}, 1, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY TO_CHAR(create_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY createDate ASC

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN TRUNC(create_time) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) THEN 1 END) AS todayCount, COUNT(*) AS totalCount, ROUND( CASE WHEN COUNT(CASE WHEN TRUNC(create_time) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 1 AND create_time <= SYSDATE THEN 1 END) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (COUNT(CASE WHEN TRUNC(create_time) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) THEN 1 END) - COUNT(CASE WHEN TRUNC(create_time) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 1 AND create_time <= SYSDATE THEN 1 END)) / COUNT(CASE WHEN TRUNC(create_time) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 1 AND create_time <= SYSDATE THEN 1 END) END, 2) AS growthRate FROM sys_log WHERE is_deleted = 0

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN TRUNC(create_time) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) THEN ip END) AS todayCount, COUNT(DISTINCT ip) AS totalCount, ROUND( CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN TRUNC(create_time) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 1 AND create_time <= SYSDATE THEN ip END) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN TRUNC(create_time) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) THEN ip END) - COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN TRUNC(create_time) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 1 AND create_time <= SYSDATE THEN ip END)) / COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN TRUNC(create_time) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 1 AND create_time <= SYSDATE THEN ip END) END, 2) AS growthRate FROM sys_log WHERE is_deleted = 0
